name: Human
description: You have the power of Humanity. As a main player or ally, after encounter cards are revealed, use this power to add 4 to your side's total. If this power is zapped, however, your side automatically wins the encounter.
lore: Warlike and fairly dim by Cosmic standards, humans are not seen as much of a threat. However, exposing a human to Cosmic energy can unlock strange and awesome powers. General consensus among the other races is that this is a course of action to be avoided.

wild.description: As a main player, after encounter cards are revealed, if your opponent is not the Human, you may use this flare to change your encounter card into an attack 42. Give this flare to the Human after use (or discard it, if the Human isn't playing).

super_flare.description: You may cause your power to add 8 to your side's total instead of 4. Also, you may discard this flare to zap your power.
